title: Coffee cake
ingredients: ['For the coffee cake', '175g unsalted butter, softened', '175g light brown sugar', '3 large eggs', '3 tablespoons instant coffee', '200g plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', 'For the icing', '200g icing sugar', '115g unsalted butter, softened', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon instant coffee', '1 to 2 tablespoons milk']
